articles.title: European Commission's universal charging port deliberations might be finalized in June 2022 - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The European Commission (EC) has long been linked with a move to make all OEMs use the same charging port (more than likely USB type-C) in all mobile devices intended for use within its jurisdiction. A decision to enforce this resolution is now said to arrive…
